issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: After updating Titanium to 3.0(during update it installed alloy) I was expecting to see Alloy template option in Titanium Mobile Project Wizzard but apparently it's not there. I can use CLI to create default alloy project which simply create 'Hello world' window and that's it. Please see attached screenshots.
fields.summary: I do not see the alloy templates being displayed in the Project Wizard,

comments.body:
Hi Andrey,

Sadly I can't see any screenshots attached. I believe you can attach them by going to Edit.

But, 3.0.2 should fix that for you. Can you clarify?

Thanks!
